name: debugPlayer
description: SteamID64 of player to be shown during debugging

name: defaultMapName
description: Map name when it is not available (i.e. main menu)

name: defaultModeName
description: Mode name when a matching clantag is not found, see validKzModes below

name: showTimesFromSpectated
description: Whether to show times of spectated players

name: wsEndpoint
description: Local or remote host to your WebSocket server

name: wsProtocols
description: String or array of protocols to add when connecting

name: dataFetchInterval
description: Time in seconds on how often data is refreshed

name: apiClientBaseUrl
description: Base url for retrieving 'global' statistics from

name: apiClientCacheLifetime
description: Cache lifetime for http queries, in seconds

name: validKzModes
description: Clantags considered to be valid KZ modes

name: validKzMapPrefixes
description: Map prefixes considered to be valid KZ

name: validKzGlobalModes
description: Mappings of valid KZ modes into 'global' modes
